title: vaa vaa shikivaahana
sahitya:
vAvA shikhivAhana dEvAdi dEvA

anupallavi
 
mUvA mudalvA ArumukhavAmiDiyugavE keDimighavE

caraNam
 
tUya nin padAmbujat-toNDu sheidaDiyEn uyyavE en jayanE sheyya vEl murugayya
kaniyavAya kavi kunjaradAsan en tIya vinaigaL naiyanEya nintALganbenakkinnum nI
aruL sheyyavE
